nl.renarj.jasdb.api.model

Interface DBInstance

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Instance
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DBInstanceImpl

    public interface DBInstance
extends Instance
    This represents a DB Instance, every JasDB can have multiple instances. Each instance is a unit which can contain bags which can have indexes and stored data entities.
    Author:
    Renze de Vries

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Bag getBag(String bagName)
      Retrieves the bag metadata for a bag with given name in this instance
      List<Bag> getBags()
      Retrieves the list of bags for this instance
      void removeBag(String bagName)
      Removes the requested bag from this instance, will remove the bag with all data and its indexes

      • Methods inherited from interface nl.renarj.jasdb.api.metadata.Instance

        getInstanceId, getPath

    • Method Detail

      • getBag

        Bag getBag(String bagName)
           throws JasDBStorageException
        Retrieves the bag metadata for a bag with given name in this instance
        Parameters:
        bagName - The name of the bag to retrieve metadata for
        Returns:
        The bagMeta if found
        Throws:
        JasDBStorageException - If unable to load the bag metadata

      • getBags

        List<Bag> getBags()
                  throws JasDBStorageException
        Retrieves the list of bags for this instance
        Returns:
        THe list of bags for this instance
        Throws:
        JasDBStorageException - If unable to retrieve the list of bags for this instance

      • removeBag

        void removeBag(String bagName)
               throws JasDBStorageException
        Removes the requested bag from this instance, will remove the bag with all data and its indexes
        Parameters:
        bagName - THe name of the bag to remove from this instance
        Throws:
        JasDBStorageException - If unable to remove the bag
